title: Fujiyama
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A small Japanese food restaurant whose owner is aware of vegan requirements and is willing to produce a specifically vegan menu when you ask. Vegan dishes might included avocado, cucumber, pickle makis; vegetable tempura (with egg in the batter but owner can make without egg - though same fryer as non veg food); plus other items like edamame, courgette, mushroom yakatori, vegetable temaki.
